title: How long does it take to set up a business in Dubai?
content: The business setup process typically takes 2-4 weeks, depending on the type of license and location chosen. Free zone setups are generally faster than mainland setups.

title: What are the costs involved in business setup?
content: Costs vary based on business type, location, and services required. Our packages start from AED 5,000 for basic setups, with comprehensive packages available.

title: Do I need a local partner for mainland business setup?
content: Recent changes in UAE law allow 100% foreign ownership for most business activities on the mainland, eliminating the need for a local partner in many cases.

title: What is included in your PRO services?
content: Our PRO services include visa processing, document attestation, government relations, license renewals, and all official document handling with UAE authorities.

title: Can you help with Golden Visa applications?
content: Yes, we provide complete Golden Visa application services, including eligibility assessment, document preparation, and submission to UAE authorities.
